casebody.data:
Danny HOPPER, Employee
v.
LAKESIDE MILLS, INC., Employer, Penn Millers Insurance Company, Carrier No. 156P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018. Kathleen G. Sumner, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, David P. Stewart, Attorney at Law, for Hopper, Danny. Dawn Raynor, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Jefferson Whisenant, Attorney at Law, for Lakeside Mills, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 29th of May 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
